Date: {{date}}

Respected {{name}},

Om Saravana Bhavaya Namaha

We humbly thank you for your benevolent donation to Sri Subramanya Swamy Cultural Center during the auspicious year {{year}}. Your generous offering is a heartfelt expression of your unwavering devotion to  Muruga, and it aids us in preserving our cherished traditions and cultural heritage.

Donation Summary:
Donor Name: {{name}}
Tax Year: {{year}}
Total Tax-Deductible Contribution: ${{totalContribution}}

Please consider this letter as a token of our sincere appreciation and as a record of your valuable contribution.

{{supportMessage}}

May  Sri Subramanya Swamy, the remover of obstacles and the granter of wisdom, bestow upon you and your family robust health, immense joy, and spiritual prosperity. As His divine vel illuminates the path of righteousness, may His grace enrich your life with success and inner light.

Your generous donation sustains His eternal legacy and empowers our temple to continue its sacred service to the community. We remain forever grateful for your support and pray that your devotion inspires countless others to walk the path of dharma (righteousness) and bhakti (devotion).

May the divine blessings of  Muruga always be with you and your loved ones!

In Devotion and Humble Service,
Sri Subramanya Swamy Cultural Center

Founder and Chief Priest: Harshavardhan Swamy
